00042 #ifndef __vtkContact_h
00043 #define __vtkContact_h
00044 #include "vtkESQuiCommonWin32Header.h"
00045 #include "vtkObject.h"
00046 #include "vtkObjectFactory.h"
00047 #include "vtkPoints.h"
00048 #include "vtkIdList.h"
00049 
00051 class VTK_ESQUI_COMMON_EXPORT vtkContact : public vtkObject {
00052     
00053 public:
00055     vtkTypeRevisionMacro(vtkContact,vtkObject);
00056 
00058     static vtkContact *New();
00060     void PrintSelf(ostream& os, vtkIndent indent);
00062     const char *GetClassName() {return "vtkContact";};
00063 
00065     void DeepCopy(vtkContact *info);
00066 
00068 
00071     vtkSetMacro(ToolId, vtkIdType);
00072 
00074 
00078     vtkGetMacro(ToolId, vtkIdType);
00079 
00081 
00084     vtkSetMacro(OrganId, vtkIdType);
00085 
00087 
00091     vtkGetMacro(OrganId, vtkIdType);
00092     
00094 
00099     void InsertPointId(int position, int id) {this->PointIds->InsertId(position, id);};
00100 
00102 
00107     int GetPointId(int position) {return this->PointIds->GetId(position);};
00108     
00110     int GetOrganPointId() {return this->PointIds->GetId(0);};
00112     int GetToolPointId() {return this->PointIds->GetId(1);};
00113 
00115 
00122     void InsertPoint(int position, double x, double y, double z) {
00123         this->Points->InsertPoint(position, x, y, z);
00124     };
00125 
00127 
00132     void InsertPoint(int position, double point[3]) {
00133         this->InsertPoint(position, point[0],point[1],point[2]);
00134     };
00136 
00141     double * GetPoint(int position) {return this->Points->GetPoint(position);};
00142 
00144     double * GetOrganPoint() {return this->Points->GetPoint(0);};
00146     double * GetToolPoint() {return this->Points->GetPoint(1);};
00147 
00149 
00154     void InsertCellId(int position, vtkIdType value) {this->CellIds->InsertId(position, value);}
00155 
00157 
00162     int GetCellId(int position) {return this->CellIds->GetId(position);};
00163 
00165     int GetOrganCellId() {return this->CellIds->GetId(0);};
00167     int GetToolCellId() {return this->CellIds->GetId(1);};
00168 
00170     void SetDirectionVector(double x, double y, double z)
00171     {
00172         this->Direction[0] = x;
00173         this->Direction[1] = y;
00174         this->Direction[2] = z;
00175     };
00176 
00178     void SetDirectionVector(double dir[3])
00179     {
00180         this->SetDirectionVector(dir[0], dir[1], dir[2]);
00181     };
00182 
00184     double * GetDirectionVector() {return this->Direction;};
00185 
00187     //void SetForceMagnitude(double value) {this->ForceMagnitude = value;};
00188 
00190     //double GetForceMagnitude() {return this->ForceMagnitude;};
00191 
00193     //bool IsGrasped() {return this->isGrasped;};
00194 
00196     //void SetAsGrasped(bool value) { isGrasped = value;};
00197 
00198 protected:
00199     vtkContact();
00200     ~vtkContact();
00201 private:
00202 
00203     // Modelo Deformable colisionado (-1 si no colisiona con ningun modelo)
00205     int OrganId;
00206 
00207     // Herramienta que produjo la colision
00209     int ToolId;
00210 
00211     // Posición donde se debe mover el vertice para sacarlo de la herramienta
00213     // Points[0]: Organ Point
00214     // Points[1]: Tool Point
00215     vtkPoints * Points;
00216 
00217     // Numero del vertice del modelo deformable colisionado
00219     // PointIds[0]: Organ Point Id
00220     // PointIds[1]: Tool Point Id
00221     vtkIdList * PointIds;
00222 
00223     // Id de la celda del vertice colisionado
00225     // CellIds[0]: Organ Cell Id
00226     // CellIds[1]: Tool Cell Id
00227     vtkIdList * CellIds;
00228 
00229     // Vector Director del contacto
00231     double Direction[3];
00232 
00234     bool isGrasped;
00235 
00236     vtkContact (const vtkContact &);//NotImplemented
00237     void operator =(const vtkContact &);//Not Implemented
00238 };
00239 #endif
